plot outline: Kesavan (Vimal) and Pattai Murugan (Siva Karthikeyan) are two friends, who jerk around the town with their friends all the while with no "get-up-and-go" purpose at all. However, they have ambitions to make it big in Politics and go about trying to win people's vote with weird tricks up their sleeve. Kesavan is smitten and bitten by Mithra ( Bindu ), whereas Murugan's love interest is Paapa ( Regina). They roll their brains trying to impress their ladylove only to get rejected time to time. Soori is their TASMAC companion who loyally tags along till the end. At the same time, their parents find a hard time convincing the duo to be serious in life and give up entirely as they heed to none.
title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
plot: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

Kesavan (Vimal) and Pattai Murugan (Siva Karthikeyan) are two friends, who jerk around the town with their friends all the while with no "get-up-and-go" purpose at all. However, they have ambitions to make it big in Politics and go about trying to win people's vote with weird tricks up their sleeve. Kesavan is smitten and bitten by Mithra ( Bindu ), whereas Murugan's love interest is Paapa ( Regina). They roll their brains trying to impress their ladylove only to get rejected time to time. Soori is their TASMAC companion who loyally tags along till the end. At the same time, their parents find a hard time convincing the duo to be serious in life and give up entirely as they heed to none.::Pandiyan
